description: Deliver one-to-one and group fitness sessions, design personalized training programs, and support members to achieve measurable fitness goals.
responsibilities: Conduct fitness assessments; design and deliver training plans; teach group classes; monitor client progress and adjust programs; maintain a safe training environment and uphold studio policies.
education_required: Diploma in Fitness or Sports Science
certifications: Certified Personal Trainer (e.g., NASM/CPT or equivalent)
